original_text: If I have ever done any of those things, then may thorn bushes grow in my fields instead of wheat. May weeds grow in my fields instead of barley.’ That is the end of the things that Job said. If I have ever done any of those things, then may thorn bushes grow in my fields instead of wheat. korean_text: 밀 대신에 가시나무가 나고 보리 대신에 독보리가 나는 것이 마땅하니라 하고 욥의 말이 그치니라

sentences.original_text: If I have ever done any of those things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 그런 일들을 한 적이 있다면
